Financial calendar for Aqualis ASA

FINANCIAL YEAR 2015

Quarterly Report – Q4 – 02/18/2016

FINANCIAL YEAR 2016

Quarterly Report – Q1 – 04/26/2016
Quarterly Report – Q2 – 08/25/2016
Quarterly Report – Q3 – 10/27/2016

Annual General Meeting – 05/20/2016

This information is published pursuant to the Requirements set out in the Continuing Obligations.
